mapper.select: SELECT s.ID AS scheduleId, s.TITLE, s.CONTENT, s.START_DATE AS startDate, s.END_DATE AS endDate, s.COLOR_CODE, r.RESERVER_TYPE AS reserverType, r.ID AS reserverId, CASE WHEN r.RESERVER_TYPE = 'USER' THEN u.REALNAME WHEN r.RESERVER_TYPE = 'TEAM' THEN t.TEAM_NAME END AS reserverName, s.IS_ACTIVE AS isActive FROM TB_SCHEDULE s JOIN TB_RESERVER r ON s.RESERVER_ID = r.ID LEFT JOIN TB_USER_RESERVER ur ON r.ID = ur.RESERVER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON ur.USER_ID = u.ID LEFT JOIN TB_TEAM_RESERVER tr ON r.ID = tr.RESERVER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_TEAM t ON tr.TEAM_ID = t.ID WHERE s.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND s.START_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY s.START_DATE ASC, s.END_DATE ASC, s.ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SCHEDULE ( TITLE, CONTENT, RESERVER_ID, CREATED_BY, START_DATE, END_DATE, COLOR_CODE, IS_ACTIVE ) VALUES ( #{dto.title}, #{dto.content}, #{reserverId}, #{createdBy}, TO_DATE(#{dto.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{dto.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{dto.colorCode}, 'Y' )
